description: Phase that retrieves a container ID (from a recipe variable if configured or via user input), determines the material lot, and displays the lot’s material ID, material description and all user-defined attribute (UDA) names and values.
intent: To present the operator with lot-specific attribute data for a container’s material lot and make those values available for PTL and downstream calculation phases.

inputs.ContainerID: Container identifier retrieved from a recipe variable or entered/scanned by the operator
inputs.MaterialID: Entered or scanned material identifier when the lot has multiple associated materials

outputs.MaterialID: Determined material identifier for the selected lot
outputs.UDAAttributes: List of user-defined attribute names and values for the lot

postconditions: Lot UDA list populated and made available for PTL and calculation phases
side_effects: Displays instructions regarding equipment that must be recorded
example_usage: Operator scans or enters a container ID (or the phase retrieves it from a recipe variable), enters a material ID if prompted, reviews the displayed lot attributes and UDA values, then selects Finish to save and proceed.
